io.micronaut.views.turbo

Annotation Type TurboFrameView


  • @Documented
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Target(value=METHOD)
public @interface TurboFrameView
    Annotation to ease the return of TurboFrame in routes.
    Since:
    3.4.0
    Author:
    Sergio del Amo
